subtitle: This nutritious soup is an ideal lunch for all the family. Serve with warm, crusty bread.

method.text: Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the onions and carrots and cook for 2-3 min.
Stir in the sun-dried tomatoes and chicken. Increase the heat slightly and saute for 2 min, stirring constantly. Add the leeks and cook until just beginning to soften.
Pour in the stock and wine and simmer gently for 5 min. Season to taste. Serve in warm bowls.

title: Chicken, leek and sun-dried tomato soup
